ul.li: School will be operating under the Instructional Continuity Plan through the remainder of the school year. All school buildings and facilities are closed at this time. More Information »

div.p: The mission of Essex North Shore Agricultural & Technical School is to create a culture of academic and technical excellence, encourage continuous intellectual growth, and promote professionalism, determination, and citizenship for all students, as they develop into architects, artisans, and authors of the 21st-century community. Read more…

Essex North Shore Agricultural and Technical School is one of 100 local nonprofits to receive grants of $100,000 each through Cummings Foundation “$100K for 100” program. The School was chosen from a total of 574 applicants during a competitive review process. Read more…

ul.li: Coronavirus Information We will continue to share updates as more information becomes available. All communications emailed to families will be posted below. Tuesday, April 21, 2020 School Closure Update & Instructional... read more »
Kindness Week 2020 Dear ENSATS Community, This week was supposed to be our 2nd annual Kindness Week. We have been working for several months to plan an exciting week that would be... read more »

Essex Tech Staff Use 3D Printers to Make Face Shields DANVERS — Superintendent Heidi Riccio and Principal Shannon Donnelly are pleased to share that faculty and staff at Essex Tech are using 3D printers to make face shields for... read more »

Course Selection is Underway Dear ENSATS Community, The course selection process for next school year is now underway! Please see the timelines for the entire process below. Instructor Recommendations: February 24 –... read more »

h2.a: Late Start Day – Blue Periods CDE Arrive

blockquote.p: “Essex North Shore taught me the foundational skills that I needed to further my education in my field after high school and eventually open a successful business and be self-employed.” Julie Pantages, Class of 1996

div.p: Essex North Shore Agricultural & Technical School 565 Maple Street Hathorne, MA 01937
